review_text: Loved every moment of this trek. The guide was fantastic, and the natural beauty is unmatched.
A fun and safe experience. The instructor was very helpful. Would do it again!
The eco-friendly boats and the tranquility of the ride were amazing. Highly recommend it!
The tour was well-organized, and the tea-tasting session was delightful. A must-try!
A relaxing experience in nature. The guides were knowledgeable and friendly.
